metadata.title: CVE-2020-18900 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** A heap-based buffer overflow in thelibexe_io_handle_read_coff_optional_header function of libyal libexe before20181128. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libexeissue 1 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libevtx package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
